Sweet list of useful #rstats packages.

https://t.co/A0c4HbyPca

In grad school, @jrosenberg6432 convinced me to learn R. Today, I'm holding our book in my hands!! I can't fully describe this feeling, but I am very, very thankful. #publishedauthor #rstats https://t.co/QGCiRXT7LL

#Rose
library(tidyverse)
seq(-4,4,by=.012) %>%
  expand.grid(x=., y=.) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=(1-abs(x)-sin(y^2)), y=(1+y-cos(x^2)))) +
  geom_point(alpha=.03, shape=20, size=0)+
  theme_void()+
  coord_polar()

#rstats #maths #creativecoding https://t.co/ccmiPoIhv2
